project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple text-based game involving room navigation, item collection, and encountering challenges.

task.name: Set up the basic structure of the game with room navigation
Create an inventory system to view collected items
Develop simple challenges for the player to encounter in different rooms
Write tests for room navigation, item pickup, inventory viewing, and challenge encounters
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
